body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carriage maker. Delaware native. Son of Julia Harper. Married to Harriet Jones Harper on April 28, 1849, in Jefferson County, Kentucky. Father of Francis Harper, Mary L. Harper, Charles Harper. Bookkeeper in Louisville in 1850. Carriage trimmer in Louisville in 1860.
